> [{quoted}](name=FiveAneurysms,realm=EUNE,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=QT1dvbHF,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2019-06-01T23:14:17.309+0000)

and red mercy. 

"This ONE-SHOT build on New Morde is 100% Stupid wtf?" 
"So Riot Reworked Ryze AGAIN.. But It's SO GOOD NOW!!!"
"100% BEST LEAGUE SKIN EVER!"
(his recent 3 titles.)

add professor akali, i saw him in my recommended. and then i searched through his content and wow. literally every video he does is clickbait. sylas got a minor change. 'SYLAS REWORK  100% BROKEN (RIOT WTF).

Solo Renekton Only.
"WHAT IS RIOT THINKING??? NEW GRAGAS BUFFS MAKE HIM BEYOND BROKEN! FULL AP GRAGAS - League of Legends"
"100% TILT THE ENEMY TOP LANER WITH MAX POKE SWAIN! SWAIN SEASON 9 TOP GAMEPLAY! - League of Legends"
"HOW IS THIS NOT NERFED?? ENDLESS CHAIN ILLAOI E STRAT IS 100% UNFAIR! ILLAOI TOP - League of Legends"

see professor akali seems like a chill dude but for some reason I just can't enjoy the content it may be cause it only auto plays at night time after I fall asleep while watching tilterella. It just will autoplay randomly from time to time and its very annoying.

It's more pathetic that it works.

Although those things should really be flagged, since blatant false information in a thumbnail/title is against youtube's tos.

can people stop overusing the word pathetic
why is this pathtetic for instance? does it really call for your pity or do you just hate it because there's a difference

Yes. I pity the people who are so devoid of creativity that they make and share videos of them just playing a game, and outright lie about the contents of the videos.

I pity the people who follow and watch their videos, whose time could be better spent even just watching people who aren't liars.

Was that the answer you wanted?
lie? who in their right mind will believe bs like that it's an obvious exaggeration why would people making views out of kids friendly videos making you sooo mad?

A lie is still a lie, no matter how exaggerated.

And you brought up exactly who would believe such a thing; kids. So yeah, I still maintain that I pity people who have to scam children instead of actually putting effort into making content.

and then that solo top renekton guy gets mad cause he thinks he invented the clickbait type shit for league and people are copying him like that twink glaccier. its like dude. dont be proud of that you autistic fuck

I 100% (beyond broken) believe that all of these clickbait youtubers collaborate together. They literally all use the same font, same format, same titles, there's no difference in the videos at all.

Like, just take a picture from a random clickbait LoL video and make people guess if it was made by Professor Akali, or SoloRenektonOnly, or foggedftw or Redmercy or Glacierr. It'd honestly be hard to tell. Actually, now that I think about it, that should be a game for the Memes & Games forum.

Props to this Balori person though, at least they _slightly_ alter the font to make their thumbnails noticeably different.
Ive never seen a youtube video on the LOL client but ok

Made me laugh.
It's certainly 100% beyond clickbait
I'd upvote but there isnt enough **NUCLEAR ONESHOTS?!?!** in this meme.

Solorenektononly as well

Stopped watching all of those youtubers because of the clickbaiting.
If they used moderation instead of making everything sound incredibly op at all times I might watch again.

I like how every time a champion receives massive changes (not a rework) like Wukong recently, they put in the title "rework". The same thing repeats now with Sylas and Ryze. 
That guy Bunny Fu Fu, I decided to watch one of his videos and immediately regret it, why does he have to scream, my god...
Downvoting because there's no red arrows in the picture

*Zooms into the streamer's face 29 times a video*

Comments: "WOW SUCH GODLIKE EDITING!!!"

When that's the main market you can see why they do it.

First that comes to my mind is NB3
"WHAT IS THIS CHAMPION? SO BROKEN. RAGE QUIT 1v9 PENTAKILL. BEST JUNGLER EVER 

2 weeks later. Ends up on lane and get buffs.

In League's defense, it's not uncommon to see that for any game played on YouTube.
To these people, the game is fantastic if they win, but it's a piece of shit if they lose.
I find the people who whine about clickbait titles more annoying than clickbait titles. Like why the fuck do you even care?
they got clickbaited and didn't like it probably more than once :)
